title: Central America Travel Route
name: Central America Travel Route
description:
A Map by Christianbaatz

A four week travel route thorugh Honduras, Guatemala, Belize and Yucatan.

properties.name: Belize City
properties.description: Posted by ChristianbaatzBelize CityThe capital of the former british colony Belize. Start here to the famous cayes and reefs.

properties.name: Cancun Airport
properties.description: Posted by ChristianbaatzGo straight to the airport and fly out. There is no reason to spend time in crowded Cancun and pay too much money for things you get much cheaper at other, more mexican places.

properties.name: Caye Caulker
properties.description: Posted by Christianbaatz17.74868, -88.02389Tiny island with lots of backpackers :)

properties.name: Chetumal
properties.description: Posted by ChristianbaatzCity at the border to Belize, from where we head on to Tulum.

properties.name: Coba (Maya Ruins)
properties.description: Posted by ChristianbaatzHidden in the jungle and only 30% uncovered from trees and plants.

properties.name: Coban
properties.description: Posted by ChristianbaatzOne of the backpacker\'s places in Guatemala. Just hang out or enjoy the excellent day-tours provided from there.

properties.name: Copan (Maya Ruins)
properties.description: Posted by ChristianbaatzWow, that\'s a great place to go. Less traveled than all the other mayan ruins in central America!

properties.name: Cozumel
properties.description: Posted by ChristianbaatzA great dive spot for drift dives and hopefully not too many tourists...

properties.name: Flores
properties.description: Posted by ChristianbaatzNice location on an island and best place to start a tour to Tikal Maya Ruins.

properties.name: La Ceiba
properties.description: Posted by ChristianbaatzTransfer from Roatan and really close to one of the last larger primary rain forrests in Honduras.

properties.name: Orange Walk Town
properties.description: Posted by ChristianbaatzFrom here we wanna take a boat ride up the river through the jungle to the hidden Lamanai Maya Ruins.

properties.name: Playa del Carmen
properties.description: Posted by ChristianbaatzThe famous mexican beach.

properties.name: Roatan (Inn of Last Resort)
properties.description: Posted by ChristianbaatzÂ Closed to the famous West End but not as crowded!

properties.name: Roatan (Reef House)
properties.description: Posted by ChristianbaatzA great place for Diving, especially the southern part where absolutely no tourists are!

properties.name: Tela
properties.description: Posted by ChristianbaatzGreat beach place.

properties.name: Tikal (Maya Ruins)
properties.description: Posted by ChristianbaatzMaybe THE greatest Maya site ever found in Central America.

properties.name: Tulum (Maya Ruins)
properties.description: Posted by ChristianbaatzTiny ruins but a great scenery at a crystal clear beach.
